name: R5-CapabilityStatement-R4B-CapabilityStatement
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 CapabilityStatement into FHIR R4B

target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.contact`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.contained`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.copyright` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.copyright`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.date` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the capability statement

target.display: Natural language description of the capability statement
target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement.description` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.description`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.document` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.document`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.document.documentation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.document.documentation`

R5 `CapabilityStatement.document.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CapabilityStatement.document.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.document.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.document.id`

R5 `CapabilityStatement.document.mode` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.document.mode` - mode has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/document-mode|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/document-mode|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement.document.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CapabilityStatement.document.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`

element.display: Constraint on the resources used in the document

target.display: Constraint on the resources used in the document
target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement.document.profile` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.document.profile`

element.display: For testing purposes, not real usage

target.display: For testing purposes, not real usage
target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement.experimental` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.experimental`

R5 `CapabilityStatement.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CapabilityStatement.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`

R5 `CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.fhirVersion` - fhirVersion has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/FHIR-version|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/FHIR-version|4.3.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: formats supported (xml | json | ttl | mime type)

target.display: formats supported (xml | json | ttl | mime type)
target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement.format` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.format` - format using http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/mimetypes is exempted and assumed equivalent
R5 `CapabilityStatement.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.id`

element.display: Additional identifier for the CapabilityStatement (business identifier)
If this describes a specific instance

target.display: If this describes a specific instance
target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementation`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementation.custodian` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementation.custodian`

R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementation.description` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementation.description` - description has change due to type change: R5 description markdown has no equivalent or mapped type in R4B description

R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementation.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementation.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `extension`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementation.id` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementation.id`

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementation.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementation.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4B `modifierExtension`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementation.url` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementation.url`
R5 `CapabilityStatement.implementationGuide` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.implementationGuide`

R5 `CapabilityStatement.kind` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.kind` - kind has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/capability-statement-kind|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/capability-statement-kind|4.3.0 (Equivalent)
R5 `CapabilityStatement.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4B `CapabilityStatement.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred

R5 `CapabilityStatement.messaging.documentation` maps as Equivalent to R4B `CapabilityStatement.messaging.documentation`
